description: man crouching on one knee with opposite leg out in front of him, shooting a rifle; man wears hat, blue and grey hat and grey pants; clouds of smoke emitting from gun barrel; thick trees in middle ground; rust-colored foliage on hill in ULQ
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

LRC, in pencil: illegible inscriptions; on back, in pencil: [7], [MK29324] , [LEPÈRE], [#46039-001], [VLR] and [od-06]
provenance: [Eric G. Carlson Fine Prints and Drawings, New York, until 2010; sold in August for ITOO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2010-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC, in the print: [AL]; LRC, in pencil: [A Lepère]; LLC, in pencil: [Le Bracconier (illegible)]
title: The Poacher
